topics.Service: I reserved my room online and followed up with a phone call to confirm dates and a driver from Borispyl, had no issues with booking.

topics.Room amenities: There is also a "minibar" in the rooms with coffee, tea, and snacks at admittedly reasonable prices.
topics.Cleanliness: Accommodations: Clean, cozy, and beautifully designed.
